name: Mega Man: The Phantom Challenger
description: ★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★ - Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump - Space to fire your blaster - Press Down while running to perform a Slide - Press Z or X to switch Special Weapons (if you have any) - Hold Up or W on ladders to climb them ( you do not need your mouse to play this game, except for using the Omega Chaser ) ★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★ <<<>>> NOTE: If the game takes too long to load or is running slow, you can try playing it on a different browser or going here: https://turbowarp.org/423958882 <<<>>> This is part 1 out of a 2-part game, part 2 will be released on a later date. BACKSTORY: An evil scientist named Dr. Phantom is turning innocent robots into his own war machines in order to rule the world. Megaman's arch-nemesis, Dr. Wily, sends an army of his own robots to fight Dr. Phantom, but his robots also get turned into war machines. Mega Man's creator, Dr. Light sends Mega Man on an adventure to destroy these evil robots and stop Team Phantom, once and for all. Fight against 8 different Phantom Agents and obtain their special weapons, which you can use to fight the other Robots. -- If you have a suggestion or see a problem in this game, please contact me on my profile. -- ★★★★★★★★★CREDITS★★★★★★★★★ -All sprites and all sound effects belong to Capcom, the original creator of Mega Man, as well as Yacht Club games for Shovel Knight SFX. - Credit to Spriters Resource, MegaPhilX,  and Sprites Inc for additional sprites - Credit to Mega Man Maker for the backgrounds and tilesets - Special thanks to RRThiel, Cosmicgem, MaxOKE2, Khinsider, Tiled, Awsomachine, Zdagger67, Pixelated-Dude, Chips n' Cellos, and Textcraft.
